simple_light_remote_server.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #!/usr/bin/env python3
2 import rospy
3 from uarm_msgs.srv import *
4 from std_srvs.srv import *
5 from geometry_msgs.msg import Point
6 from light_interface import uArm_sim_Server
7 import uarm_msgs.msg
8 import time
9 import json
10 import actionlib
11 
12 #sends move command to control_uarm
13 
14 
27 
28 class uArm_Remote_Server():
29 
30  def __init__(self,ns):
31  self.mutex = True
32  self.name = ns
33  self.uarm_pos = [0,0,0]
34 
35  self.move_action_server = actionlib.SimpleActionServer(str(self.name+'uarm_move'), uarm_msgs.msg.uarm_moveAction, self.move, auto_start = False)
36  self.move_action_server.start()
37  self.set_pump_service = rospy.Service(str(self.name+'uarm_set_pump'), uarm_pump, self.set_pump)
38  self.recalibration_action_server = actionlib.SimpleActionServer(str(self.name+'uarm_reset'), uarm_msgs.msg.uarm_moveAction, self.reset, auto_start = False)
39  self.recalibration_action_server.start()
40  self.state_service = rospy.Service(str(self.name+'uarm_get_state'), uarm_get_state, self.get_state)
41  self.auto_move_action_server = actionlib.SimpleActionServer(str(self.name+'uarm_auto_move'), uarm_msgs.msg.uarm_moveAction, self.auto_move, auto_start = False)
42  self.auto_move_action_server.start()
43  self.position_listener = rospy.Subscriber(str(ns+"position"), Point, self.callback)
44  self.uarm = uArm_sim_Server(self.name)
45  print("uarm_listener started")
46  self.uarm.move(180,0,130)
47 
48  def callback(self, data):
49  self.uarm_pos = [data.x, data.y, data.z]
50 
51  def move(self, data):
52  rospy.loginfo('%s: new goal received [%i, %i, %i]' % (str(self.name+'uarm_move server'), int(data.x),int(data.y),int(data.z)))
53  result = uarm_msgs.msg.uarm_moveResult()
54  if self.mutex == True:
55  self.mutex = False
56  # api-endpoint
57  if not self.uarm.check_limits(int(data.x),int(data.y),int(data.z)):
58  rospy.loginfo('%s: target position out of range [%i, %i, %i]' % (str(self.name+'uarm_move server'), int(data.x),int(data.y),int(data.z)))
59  result.success = False
60  self.mutex = True
61  return self.move_action_server.set_succeeded(result)
62  self.uarm.move(int(data.x),int(data.y),int(data.z))
63  while self.uarm.busy:
64  if self.move_action_server.is_preempt_requested():
65  print("recieved cancle request")
66  result.success = False
67  self.uarm.stop()
68  self.mutex = True
69  rospy.loginfo('%s: goal reached [%i, %i, %i]' % (str(self.name+'uarm_move server'), int(data.x),int(data.y),int(data.z)))
70  return self.move_action_server.set_preempted()
71 
72  self.mutex = True
73 
74  result.success = True
75  print(result)
76  return self.move_action_server.set_succeeded(result)
77  else:
78  result.success = False
79  return self.move_action_server.set_succeeded(result)
80 
81  #pick up cargo and delivers to destination
82  def auto_move(self, data):
83  result = uarm_msgs.msg.uarm_moveResult()
84  positions = [[self.uarm_pos[0],self.uarm_pos[1],130], [int(data.x), int(data.y), 130], [int(data.x), int(data.y), int(data.z)]]
85  if self.mutex == True:
86  self.mutex = False
87  # api-endpoint
88  for i in positions:
89  if not self.uarm.move(i[0], i[1], i[2]):
90  result.success = False
91  self.mutex = True
92  return self.auto_move_action_server.set_succeeded(result)
93  while self.uarm.busy:
94  if self.auto_move_action_server.is_preempt_requested():
95  print("recieved cancle request")
96  result.success = False
97  self.uarm.stop()
98  self.mutex = True
99  return self.auto_move_action_server.set_preempted()
100  result.success = True
101  self.mutex = True
102  return self.auto_move_action_server.set_succeeded(result)
103  else:
104  result.success = False
105  return self.auto_move_action_server.set_succeeded(result)
106 
107 
108  def set_pump(self, data):
109  rospy.loginfo(rospy.get_caller_id() + "I heard %s", str(data.run) )
110  if self.mutex == True:
111  self.mutex = False
112 
113  self.uarm.set_pump(data.run)
114 
115  self.mutex = True
116  return uarm_pumpResponse(True)
117  else:
118  return uarm_pumpResponse(False)
119 
120  def reset(self, data):
121  result = uarm_msgs.msg.uarm_moveResult()
122  if self.mutex == True:
123  self.mutex = False
124  # api-endpoint
125  if not self.uarm.move(180, 0, 130):
126  result.success = False
127  self.mutex = True
128  return self.recalibration_action_server.set_succeeded(result)
129 
130  while self.uarm.busy:
131  if self.recalibration_action_server.is_preempt_requested():
132  print("recieved cancle request")
133  result.success = False
134  self.uarm.stop()
135  self.mutex = True
136  return self.recalibration_action_server.set_preempted()
137 
138  self.mutex = True
139 
140  result.success = True
141  return self.recalibration_action_server.set_succeeded(result)
142  else:
143  result.success = False
144  return self.recalibration_action_server.set_succeeded(result)
145 
146  #service instead of publisher, because real uArm has to be stopped to get position
147  def get_state(self, data):
148  rospy.loginfo(rospy.get_caller_id() + "I heard %s", str(data) )
149  if self.mutex == True:
150  return uarm_get_stateResponse(ready = True, pump = self.uarm.pump_state, x = self.uarm_pos[0], y = self.uarm_pos[1], z = self.uarm_pos[2])
151  else:
152  return uarm_get_stateResponse(ready = False, pump = self.uarm.pump_state, x = self.uarm_pos[0], y = self.uarm_pos[1], z = self.uarm_pos[2])
153 
154 if __name__ == '__main__':
155  rospy.init_node('uarm_listener', anonymous=True)
156  try:
157  ns = rospy.get_param('~ns')
158  except:
159  ns = "uarm1/"
160  server = uArm_Remote_Server(ns)
161  rospy.spin()
